use_cases: ["Created a custom database containing all 315 genes from the pESI-like megaplasmid pN55391 for screening purposes", "Used ABRicate v1.0.1 with the custom pN55391 database to assess the presence of pESI-like megaplasmids in 440 Chilean Salmonella Infantis genome assemblies", "Identified and mapped the distribution of pESI-like megaplasmid genes across different HC20 clusters to determine cluster-specific associations", "Analyzed the variability of antibiotic resistance regions in Chilean pESI-like megaplasmids relative to the pN55391 reference megaplasmid"]
